reviewText: Stephanie Leonidas does a great job. The PIONEER multi region dvd player works great for all UK dvd's so far. B&H in New York city sold me, the PIONEER.

James Nesbit is the reason I bought this  HE always delivers and this is no exception.  All the performances are good.  The story is based on a true events and this is why it is interesting.  NOT a GREAT movie but worth a view.  Held my interest
